Summary: my son waited in car to take friend to work...saw disklite and took picture, then emailed them to me.
divs: Sighting Detailsmy son, while waiting for his co worker to come outside his home, while listenig to radio, spotted this disk like lite traveling at almost eye level (his home is on an elevated street) moving, stopping, moving, stopping...etc. til gone out of site over ridge where home is located in west Palmdale are. Had his cell phone on already, listening to music, grabbed it, then took picture before it went out of site. You can call him if you like...or call me, and I'll give you his number where he can be reached. He's a forman for his company, very reputable, and not likely to do anything mishieviouse. When he sent me this...it blew me away..I've been interested in the subject...but, not lucky enough to see something of this nature. When expanded...a small yellow and small blue area is noted. No wings, exhaust, aviation red blinking or anything like that.
trends: There have been 15 other sightings in Lancaster
